subject: Soccer
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: A.C. Milan will play Inter Milan in Foxborough, Mass., on July 26 as part of a four-club, six-city tournament that also includes Chelsea and Club América.
snippet: A.C. Milan will play Inter Milan in Foxborough, Mass., on July 26 as part of a four-club, six-city tournament that also includes Chelsea and Club América.
